definition: to go to extremes/to leave no room for maneuver

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
variant of 絕|绝[jue2]

sentences.english: He who does no good, does evil enough.
If items can easily be put away, do so.
sentences.chinese: 如果东西易收拾，那这么做绝没问题。

definition: to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch/to eliminate completely
to leave oneself a way out
where it is possible to let people off, one should spare them (idiom); anyone can make mistakes, forgive them when possible
pinyin: de2 rao2 ren2 chu4 qie3 rao2 ren2

definition: lit. to destroy the bridge after crossing the river (idiom)/fig. to abandon one's benefactor upon achieving one's goal
to offend Heaven and reason (idiom); bloody atrocities that cry to heaven/outrageous acts
extreme benevolence, utmost duty (idiom); meticulous virtue and attention to duty
to push sb too far/to go too far (in oppressing people)
excessive tendency to clemency (idiom)/soft-hearted (pejorative)
lit. to nurture a tiger invites calamity/fig. to indulge one's enemy is asking for trouble (idiom)
see 撕破臉|撕破脸[si1 po4 lian3]
to harm others without benefiting oneself (idiom)
a guilty conscience
a cornered dog will jump over the wall (idiom)/to be driven to desperate action
It's all exaggeration, you don't need to take it seriously/a fuss about nothing/nothing to write home about
pinyin: sha1 ren2 bu4 guo4 tou2 dian3 di4

definition: to fall out with sb and become hostile
